subject: Re: Ebay = NIB RS am/fm digital radio =$2.!!
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Ahhh.. you're right!  My bad...  I looked closer at the picture and 
then compared it to my older 12-470.  I do see differences... no 
speaker and the label at the bottom of the radio is different from my 
12-470.
I have never seen an older 12-469... until now.
Thanks, LC...

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:

external

> website

12-
> 469 
> > page has a picture of the older 12-470 and their 12-470 page has 
a 
> > picture of th 12-469.
> > That is probably where this person got the picture from, thinking 
> it is 
> > correct.  If that in fact was a real "older 12-470" he was 
selling, 
> > $14.95 would be a great price since it is very hard to find any 
> olde 12-
> > 470 in the stores anymore.  Remember, only the older 12-470 can 
be 
> > hacked, no newer 12-470 (all black case) has been hacked yet.
> > 
> > If someone were interested I would contact the guy and ask him to 
> take

> > ebay for sale.
